title: Peaches - #2 Almond meal and Peach cake

pars:
Welcome to the new year readers!
My recipes this edition include a few ways with peaches but will cover most stone fruit.

#1 Stewed Peaches: use your own method regards the amount of water and sugar you use. I’ve tweaked it a bit by gently simmering the fruit until just softened, then removing the fruit and adding 1/2 cup caster sugar, a couple of thin slices fresh ginger and a slurp of verjuice.  Bring the liquid back to the boil, then pour over the fruit and let cool. The ginger and verjuice is very subtle.

Pop into a bowl big enough, add juice,  a generous slurp of olive oil and season to taste. This goes perfectly with chicken, salmon and pork. Pretty much use whatever excess bounty you have on hand or been gifted.

Wow - that’s it. Gotta love summer fruits.Share it around, substitute other fruit, enjoy.
Cheers Pauline

method: Pre heat oven 180ø, grease and line a springform tin.
Make a batter from all the ingredients, add some milk or cream if too thick.
You want a pancake batter. To prepare the peaches, I leave the skins on.
Use enough fruit to cover the bottom of cake tin, cut fruit in halves remove the pit and arrange on the bottom of the tin - cut side UP.
Cut up 4-6 extra peaches into quarters.
Pour enough batter into the tin to cover the peaches, spread extra peaches over batter and pour over the remaining batter.
Cook for 45 minutes or until golden on top and shrinking away from tin edges.
